thread.title: Bridger Jackson
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Bridger Jackson

author: Bridger Jackson
title: Bridger Jackson
text:
Bridger Jackson. To have a company in Europe say that they will have you a pair of skies in 3 days, living in Bozeman Montana when your leaving on the third day for a ski trip is hard to believe. These guys made it happen and were extremely kind and great to work with. Wish more American companies were this spot
On with delievery and communication. I don't usually write reviews but freezproshop deserves it. Thanks for everything guys.
